#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum.

== Name ==

*[SUnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
string
  |
  +--UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			List of acceptable values for units of length using either SI or imperial units.
			The uncommon 'pace' unit is traditionnaly used for hole location sheets.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	('meters' | 'yards' | 'feet' | 'paces')

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CLengthWithUnits LengthWithUnits], [CTees Tees]
----
    <xs:simpleType name="UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum">  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">    <xs:enumeration value="meters"/>    <xs:enumeration value="yards"/>    <xs:enumeration value="feet"/>    <xs:enumeration value="paces"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
